title: Chilli con carne and tortilla stack
ingredients: ['500g beef mince', '1 medium onion, chopped', '6 medium mushrooms, chopped', '1 to 1 1/2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 (400g) tin red kidney beans', '2 tablespoons chilli powder', '1 bay leaf', '1 teaspoon Tabasco sauce', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 pack of flour tortillas', '1 large pot of soured cream', '200ml water', '3 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste']
